column4: I'm using EasyTag2.1.6 and I have a folder of over 100 mp3's all from the same Artist - is there a method to mass convert them all quickly?
select all the mp3s in EasyTag. update the artist field. next to the artist field there is a checkbox, check it to apply the change to all tracks. then write that tags.
thanks, knew it was something simple i'm missing lol.
